function.name: format_output

list_of_recommendation_sets.information: Technological advances can improve work engagement. Studies have shown that exposure to technological advances can have a positive effect on work engagement, especially for younger workers. (Source: Journal of Occupational Health, 2024, 66(1), uiae003)
list_of_recommendation_sets.tip: Use technology to automate repetitive tasks and manage work demands effectively. Allocate 30 minutes each week to explore new tools and apps that can streamline your workflow.

list_of_recommendation_sets.information: Providing training and development opportunities can help workers manage their work demands and allocate resources effectively. (Source: Journal of Occupational Health, 2024, 66(1), uiae003)
list_of_recommendation_sets.tip: Take online courses or attend workshops to improve your time management and productivity skills. Allocate 1 hour each day to learn new skills and apply them to your work.

list_of_recommendation_sets.information: Regular monitoring and evaluation of work engagement can help identify areas for improvement. (Source: Journal of Occupational Health, 2024, 66(1), uiae003)
list_of_recommendation_sets.tip: Set aside 30 minutes each week to review your work progress and identify areas for improvement. Use this time to adjust your schedule and prioritize tasks effectively.

list_of_recommendation_sets.information: Encouraging older workers to adopt technological advances can help them manage their work demands and allocate resources effectively. (Source: Journal of Occupational Health, 2024, 66(1), uiae003)
list_of_recommendation_sets.tip: If you are an older worker, take the time to learn new technological skills. Allocate 1 hour each day to practice using new tools and apps that can help you streamline your workflow.

list_of_recommendation_sets.information: Providing support to workers who need it can help improve work engagement. (Source: Journal of Occupational Health, 2024, 66(1), uiae003)
list_of_recommendation_sets.tip: Take the time to ask your colleagues if they need help with their workload. Allocate 30 minutes each week to provide support and guidance to those who need it.
